oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Homogeneous Spectrum of Milnor-Witt $K$-Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thornton, Riley
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - K-Theory and Homology
Mathematics - Algebraic Topology
14F42, 19G12, 18E30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: For any field $F$ (of characteristic not equal to 2), we determine the Zariski spectrum of homogeneous prime ideals in $K^{MW}_*(F)$, the Milnor-Witt $K$-theory ring of $F$. As a corollary, we recover Lorenz and Leicht's classical result on prime ideals in the Witt ring of $F$. Our computation can be seen as a first step in Balmer's program for studying the tensor triangular geometry of the stable motivic homotopy category.
Comment: (5/15/16) Numerous small changes made in response to referee report
